Portal is like Dota.
There is a sequel with a better story and mechanics.
Amazing story, amazing mechanics, and amazing multiplayer (for trolling your friends).  This game still holds up great, and is probably one of the best games I have ever played.

Great game with a cool storyline and very nice art.

IMMERSIVE,AMAZING!!

As for the puzzles themselves, theyâ€™re wonderful. Portal 2 has fewer agility-driven obstacles, so less dextrous gamers shouldnâ€™t find themselves stuck on anything for lack of stick-flicking ability. The new elements are each great in their own rights, and they work together beautifully. Flying through the air after setting up a mad combination of repulsion and propulsion gel is amusing, but bending your mind around using an excursion funnelâ€™s tractor beam to levitate the goo into a set of turrets that you had previously blocked with a hard light bridge from perforating you is amazing. The better co-op puzzles, where for example your partner is continually extending the funnel youâ€™re both floating in via portals while you have to extend bridges between your fragile shells and passing turrets, show unbelievable creativity.  

                                                                          :D
